name: Catapult: The Game
description:
Catapult: The Game, is a game in which you must use a catapult to defend yourself against the evil pirates.

To adjust the height at which the rock will be shot, use AD and use the weight to force it to fall on one side of the catapult.

Special thanks to Oscar Rivero for creating the wonderful music and sound effects.

NOTE: The game was developed for the Colombia Game Jam. But the development will continue!
Due to lack of time, there are still several bugs and there are not as many levels.
